text:
CA 1276 06APR URCPEK 1800 2210
15+1 / 20+1 / 25+1 / 30+1
Hari 05 / 30 MAR : BURJIN – HEMU – JIADENGYU
by (B,L,D)
Sarapan pagi, aktifitas hari ini mengunjungi objek
wisata : HEMU VILLAGE (Desa terindah di China),
JIADENGYU VALLEY (Lembah Jiadeng merupakan
pintu gerbang menuju ke Kanas Lake). Sore hari
kembali ke hotel
Hotel : Hongfu Resort Hotel / setaraf
Hari 06 / 31 MAR : JIADENGYU – KANAS – BURJIN
by (B,L,D)
Setelah sarapan pagi di hotel, berangkat untuk
mengunjungi ; KANAS NATIONAL GEOPARK (Kanas mencakup area yang luas nya 10.030 Kilometer
persegi), (Wolong Bay), SHENXIAN (FAIRY) BAY (Pemandangan indah yang tidak dapat ditemukan
dimana saja), KANAS RIVER (kita akan naik kapal untuk menikmati pemandangan sungai Kanas),
GUANYU PAVILION (Taman yang sangat mempersona), RAINBOW BEACH (disebut juga pantai lima
warna). Setelah makan malam diantar untuk check in.
trans:
CA 1276 06APR URCPEK 1800 2210
15+1 / 20+1 / 25+1 / 30+1
Day 05 / MARCH 30 : BURJIN - HEMU - JIADENGYU
by (B,L,D)
Breakfast, activities for today include visiting tourist
attraction : HEMU VILLAGE (The most beautiful village in China),
JIADENGYU VILLAGE (Jiadeng Valley is
the gateway to the Kanas Lake). At noon,
go back to hotel
Hotel : Hongfu Resort Hotel / equivalent
Day 06 / MARCH 31 : JIADENGYU - KANAS - BURJIN
by (B,L,D)
After breakfast at hotel, depart to
visit ; KANAS NATIONAL GEOPARK (Kanas covers an area of 10,030 square
Kilometers), (Wolong Bay), SHENXIAN (FAIRY) BAY (An exceptional view that can't be found
anywhere), KANAS RIVER (we will board on a ship to enjoy Kanas river's view),
GUANYU PAVILION (An extremely charming park), RAINBOW BEACH (also called as five-colored
beach). Bring you to check in after dinner.
